actions.text: Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 104-566.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails Systems Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery as a National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama (traveled during March 1965 to dramatize the need for voting rights legislation), as a National Historic Trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails Systems Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery as a National Historic Trail, and for other purposes.
